name: KPOP Tiles Deluxe 2020
description:
KPOP Tiles Deluxe 2020 will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play piano covers of your favorite K-POP songs!

HOW TO PLAY
----------------------------------
The game is pretty simple and easy to play:
• tap the tiles to play the song.
• every time you complete the song, it gets faster!
• the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!

FEATURES
----------------------------------
• Enhanced gameplay with special tiles such as long notes and bonus blocks.
• A beautiful and friendly UI.
• Lots of new songs to play every month!
• Perfect for K-poppers!

DISCLAIMER
----------------------------------
This is an unofficial fan-made application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any K-POP group, their management teams, or their record labels.
